title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Climate Change Inquiry Project: Community-Based Language Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can integrate climate change-related science concepts with language activities using Inquiry-Based Learning (IBL) methodologies.
Learners can analyze local community climate issue data and design three or more inquiry tasks suitable for elementary school students.
Learners can complete educational design proposals through peer evaluation and iterative improvements using digital collaboration tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
